stripped_text: When your turn begins, place 1 advancement token on a piece of ice protecting this server. Whenever the Runner approaches this server, end the run unless they pay 2 credits for each advanced piece of ice protecting this server. Limit 1 region per server.
text: When your turn begins, place 1 advancement token on a piece of ice protecting this server. Whenever the Runner approaches this server, end the run unless they pay 2[credit] for each advanced piece of ice protecting this server. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Cayambe Grid
